content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area
Consists of multiple furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at position(2.0, 0.0) 
- Stone furnace at position(4.0, 4.0) with coal fuel and 2 iron plates in output
- Stone furnace at position(6.0, 4.0) with coal fuel

###Inserter Assembly Line at position(23.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 for crafting inserters
- Input burner inserter at position(21.5, 2.5) with coal fuel
- Output burner inserter at position(25.5, 2.5) with coal fuel
- Input wooden chest at position(20.5, 2.5) containing 222 inserters and 1 iron plate
- Output wooden chest at position(26.5, 2.5)

###Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) producing water
- Boiler at position(-2.5, 24.0) currently out of fuel
- Steam engine at position(4.5, 24.5) not connected to power network
- Two pipe networks:
  - System 33071 (empty) connecting steam engine input
  - System 33069 (water-filled) connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Electricity network (id 109932) with multiple electric poles

ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing resources for crafting
- Ensure required materials are in inventory before attempting to craft items
- For iron gear wheels, need iron plates which must be smelted first
- Cannot craft items that require furnace/machine assembly directly from inventory

### Errors related to inserting items
- Verify items exist in inventory before attempting to insert them into machines/furnaces
- Common items that run out: coal, iron ore

### Power system issues
- Steam engine shows "not connected to power network" - ensure proper electrical pole connections
- Boiler running out of fuel frequently - maintain steady coal supply
- No fluid in steam connections - verify pipe connections between boiler and steam engine

### Assembly machine issues
- Machine shows "not receiving electricity" - check power pole connections
- Ingredient shortages - ensure input chest has all required materials (iron plate, iron gear wheel, electronic circuit)
- Verify inserters can reach both input chest and assembly machine
